Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

zoltr 0.6.3 Unreleased

  • changed job_data() (and therefore do_zoltar_query()) to parse the quantile column as double (was defaulting to logical in some cases)

zoltr 0.6.2 Unreleased

  • models(): added ânotesâ column
  • forecasts(): added three timezero columns in addition to âurlâ: âtimezero_dateâ, âdata_version_dateâ, âis_season_startâ

zoltr 0.6.1 Unreleased

  • added error message tweaks, fixed small example typos

zoltr 0.6.0 Unreleased

  • (API BREAK) Made two major changes. 1) Changed score downloading from the scores() function (removed from the library) that downloaded all scores to querying scores in a manner very similar to that of forecasts. This entailed generalizing do_zoltar_query, submit_query(), and job_data(), which now take a is_forecast_query arg. The first two now accept either "types" or "scores", depending on that arg. 2) Changed those two score query functions to pass strings, not database IDs, removing the need to call query_with_ids(), which has been deleted.

zoltr 0.5.10 Unreleased

  • Changed do_zoltar_query() query args to all be optional.

zoltr 0.5.9 Unreleased

  • Fixed job_data() to return units column as character, not numeric.
  • Added units arg to do_zoltar_query() to match submit_query().

zoltr 0.5.8 Unreleased

  • Changed busy_poll_job() to check for the new TIMEOUT status.

zoltr 0.5.7 Unreleased

  • Changed query_with_ids() to warn and ignore invalid query values.

zoltr 0.5.6 Unreleased

  • Changed query_with_ids()âs query arg to accept model abbreviations in âmodelsâ, instead of passing them in âmodel_abbrsâ, which is no longer accepted. This is because Zoltar now uses model abbreviations to uniquely identify them, not names.

zoltr 0.5.5 Unreleased

  • Added convenience functions: do_zoltar_query() and busy_poll_job().

zoltr 0.5.4 Unreleased

  • Added support for additional model metadata.

zoltr 0.5.3 Unreleased

  • Added support for querying project forecasts.

zoltr 0.5.2 Unreleased

  • Added functions to convert forecast data to data.framess.

zoltr 0.5.1 2020-04-14

  • Updated package to be compatible with Zoltar 3.1.0.

zoltr 0.5.0 2020-04-10

  • Updated entire package to be compatible with Zoltar 3.

zoltr 0.2.1 Unreleased

  • Made changes to avoid CRAN NOTE:

    checking dependencies in R code â¦ NOTE Namespaces in Imports field not imported from: âjsonliteâ âmockeryâ âreadrâ âwebmockrâ All declared Imports should be used.

zoltr 0.2.0 2019-05-22

  • Initial private beta release
